home.text_base_description: Beautiful 2BR + Den, 2BA home w/ water and city views at The Infinity! This designer updated home is finished with Italian wood look tiles throughout, upgraded bathrooms, a chef's kitchen with Studio Becker cabinetry, Bosch & Thermador appliances and custom backsplash, a custom built-out storage system with xl wine fridge, custom window treatments and custom lighting. In-unit washer/dryer and Premium Secure Underground Parking. International Superstar Architect Bernardo Fort-Brescia of Arquitectonica and local powerhouse Heller Manus have created the quintessential living experience along San Francisco's waterfront complete with a full suite of luxury amenities. Amenities include 24 hr doorman, concierge, club room with full catering kitchen, 5000 SF gym, 75-foot lap pool, sauna, theater, business center and more. Pleasant walk to Union Square, world class waterfront restaurants, and the Financial District. EZ access to public transport, freeways & the Bay Bridge.
